snippet: The Huawei 4Afrika Windows Phone will cost $150 and initially will be sold in seven African countries.
abstract: Microsoft, taking aim at world’s fastest-growing smartphone market, says it will team up with Huawei of China to sell low-cost Windows smartphone in Africa.
lead_paragraph: The Huawei 4Afrika Windows Phone will cost $150 and initially will be sold in seven African countries.

headline.seo: Microsoft and Huawei to Unite to Sell Windows Smartphones in Africa
headline.main: Microsoft and Huawei to Sell Windows Smartphones in Africa
headline.print_headline: Microsoft and Huawei of China to Unite to Sell Low-Cost Windows Smartphones in Africa
